title: Sushi Go!
description: A fast-playing card game where you are eating at a sushi restaurant and trying to grab the best combination of sushi dishes.

rounds.name: First Round
rounds.description: Deal 3 cards to each player. Players simultaneously choose one card to keep and pass the rest to the left.

operations.title: Deal Cards
operations.description: Deal 3 cards face down to each player

operations.title: Choose a Card
operations.description: Select one card to keep and place it face down in front of you

operations.title: Pass Remaining Cards
operations.description: Pass the remaining cards to the player on your left

operations.title: Reveal Cards
operations.description: Turn over your chosen card to reveal it

rounds.name: Second Round
rounds.description: Same as first round, but pass cards to the right this time.

operations.title: Deal Cards
operations.description: Deal 3 cards face down to each player

operations.title: Choose a Card
operations.description: Select one card to keep and place it face down in front of you

operations.title: Pass Remaining Cards
operations.description: Pass the remaining cards to the player on your right

operations.title: Reveal Cards
operations.description: Turn over your chosen card to reveal it

rounds.name: Third Round
rounds.description: Same as first round, pass cards to the left again.

operations.title: Deal Cards
operations.description: Deal 3 cards face down to each player

operations.title: Choose a Card
operations.description: Select one card to keep and place it face down in front of you

operations.title: Pass Remaining Cards
operations.description: Pass the remaining cards to the player on your left

operations.title: Reveal Cards
operations.description: Turn over your chosen card to reveal it

scoring.name: Scoring
scoring.description: Count points for each player based on collected cards

operations.title: Maki Rolls
operations.description: Players with the most and second most Maki Roll cards earn 6 and 3 points respectively

operations.title: Pudding Cards
operations.description: Most pudding cards at the end of the game earn 6 points, least lose 6 points

operations.title: Other Cards
operations.description: Score points for Tempura, Sashimi, Dumplings, and other cards according to their values

operations.title: Total Score
operations.description: Add up all points to determine the winner
